definition.name: Progress
definition.purpose: Display a visual progress bar indicating completion percentage
definition.description: A reusable progress bar component built on top of Radix UI's ProgressPrimitive. It visually represents a value as a horizontal bar, with customizable styling and support for partial completion.

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the root element.

initial.data: Progress bar at 0% or the provided value

visible: A horizontal bar with a background and a colored indicator showing the progress

effects: The width of the progress indicator animates to reflect the new value

definition.visualLayout: A rounded, horizontal bar with a background and a colored indicator that fills the bar according to the value prop.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses Radix UI's ProgressPrimitive for accessibility and structure. The indicator's width is controlled via a CSS transform based on the value prop. The cn utility is used for class name composition.
